message.body: Hey bridge, wanna get together tomorrow sometime? We're pretty free, let me know! Hope Xmas was lovely!
We'd love to! Little monkey has a cough, so we're keeping her in. Would you mind coming here? We're free all day tomorrow.
Sounds good, maybe sometime after lunch? When's good for you guys? Can't wait to meet her!
Before 1pm or after 2pm works best. Gracie naps/falls asleep after her lunchtime bottle. :)
Ok, we'll shoot for 230ish! Hasta ma√±ana
Just to give you a heads up, Gracie is still sick. That being said, we'd still love for you to stop by around 2:30 for a short visit if you're still game.
Poor kid! We'll come by and won't stay long, no worries :)
